text: maliaui adeul-imyeo hananim ui seonjijaui yesu geuliseudoleul u liga salhaehayeossda lago geudeul-i ju janghadeola geuleona geudeul-eun geuleul sal haehaji anihayeossgo sibjaga-e mosbag ji anihaess-eumyeo geuwa gat-eun hyeongsang-eul mandeul-eoss-eul ppun-ila ie uigyeon-eul dal lihaneun jadeul-eun uisim-imyeo geudeul-i alji moshago geuleohge chucheug-eul hal ppun geuleul salhaehaji anihaessnola
